resources.string: Battery too low to install system update. Please connect charger to continue.
Battery too low to install system update. Please wait for battery to charge sufficiently.
"System updates can't be downloaded while roaming."
Your system is currently up to date
Download of system update was unsuccessful.
Download was unsuccessful. Please try again.
There was a problem downloading the update.
There was a problem installing the update.
A system update is ready to be installed. Your Android device will restart and install the update.
A system update is ready to be installed. Your Android device will restart and install the update. You will not be able to make any calls, including emergency calls, during installation.
A system update is ready, but the battery is too low to install it. Please connect charger.
A system update is ready, but the battery is too low to install it. Please wait for battery to charge sufficiently.
A system update is available, which will enhance your Android device. If you download it over the wireless network, charges may apply.
Allows applications to read data from the Google Talk content provider.
Allows applications to write data to the Google Talk content provider.
Exchanges messages and receives sync notifications from Google servers

Used for server cloud-to-device messages and for sync notifications. Google Talk uses this service to exchange messages and to synchronise presence status. A malicious application could use this service to transmit excess data.
"Allows the applications to accept cloud-to-device messages sent by the application's service. Using this service will incur data usage. Malicious applications may cause excess data usage."
Can broadcast data messages received from the Internet to applications registered to listen for them.
send and receive XMPP messages to and from Google servers
Allows Google applications to send and receive XMPP messages to and from Google servers.
Can broadcast XMPP messages received from the Google servers to applications registered to listen for them.
send and receive XMPP messages to and from Google servers.
Allows Google applications to send and receive XMPP messages to and from Google servers.
Can broadcast XMPP messages received from the Google servers to applications.
Can send broadcasts to Android Market requesting application installation and removal.
Send heartbeat to Google Talk server
Can send a heartbeat packet to the Google Talk server to ensure the health of the connection.
%s wants to be able to chat
You have received a group chat invitation from %s
%s invites you to join a group chat.
You cannot send messages over 2,000 characters in length.
You missed a video chat invitation
You missed a voice chat invitation
"You missed a video chat invitation because you weren't connected to Wi-Fi"
"You missed a voice chat invitation because you weren't connected to Wi-Fi"
%1$s tried to initiate a video chat with you
%1$s tried to initiate a voice chat with you
"%1$s tried to start a video chat with you while you weren't connected to Wi-Fi"
"%1$s tried to start a voice chat with you while you weren't connected to Wi-Fi"
%1$s was not available for video chat.
%1$s was not available for voice chat.
You ended the video chat with %1$s.
You ended the voice chat with %1$s.
Sorry! The video chat with %1$s failed because of a network problem. Please try again.
Sorry! The voice chat with %1$s failed because of a network problem. Please try again.
Google Talk failed to log in. If this is a Google Apps account, confirm that Chat service is enabled for this account.
Touch any text box to start typing
"You don't have a SIM card installed, so you can't connect to a mobile network for voice or data services. You can connect to a Wi-Fi network without a SIM."
You don’t have a network connection.
This could be a temporary problem or your Android device may not be provisioned for data services. Please try again when connected to a mobile network or connect to a Wi-Fi network.
A problem occurred while communicating with Google servers.
Can’t establish a reliable data connection to the server.
This could be a temporary problem or your Android device may not be provisioned for data services. If it continues, call Customer Care.
Invalid character. Only 0-9, a-z, A-Z and full stops are allowed.
Your Android device is not connected to a data service. To view this information now, go to %s from any computer connected to the Internet.
This is not a valid domain name
This is not a valid username
Enter your username only, not your email address
This is not a valid account name

string.name: about_accounts_message
string.font: "It's easy to set up your Android device! All you need is a Google Account. "" "Why use a Google Account?" "" ""With a Google Account, Google applications are automatically synced between your Android device and computer, regardless of where you make an update. "" "Already have a Google Account?" "" ""Then you're all set! Simply touch \"Sign in\" on the next screen. "" ""Don't have a Google Account?"" "" ""No problem. Touch \"Create\" on the next screen and we'll help you set one up. "" "Touch \"Next\" to get started!" "

resources.string: "Slide your finger up or down the screen to scroll. (Touch this message to dismiss it.)"
Sign in with the Google Account that you want linked to this Android device.
Want to set up an account later?
By continuing, you agree to the Google and Additional Privacy Policies.
Your Android device needs to communicate with Google servers to set up your account. This may take up to five minutes.
Your Android device needs to communicate with Google servers to find your domain information. This may take up to five minutes.
By signing in, you agree to the Google and Additional Privacy Policies.
Sign in with your Google Account:
Use this screen if you have special login considerations that require a Web browser.
Cannot access your Google or Google Apps account. Reauthorisation is required.
Enter your username and password for ^1:
This account cannot be used because it belongs to an inactive domain. Please contact the domain administrator for ^1 or sign in with another account.
The text entered is not a valid username.

"There is a problem connecting to your company's servers at ^1.
Error information: "
The web login page has redirected too many times
Give your Android device a name:

"This account has been disabled.
(For details, go to http://google.co.uk/accounts/recovery on your computer.)"

"Your username and password do not match. Please try again.
(To recover your account information, go to http://www.google.co.uk/accounts/recovery on your computer.)"

"This account has not been verified. Please check your email on a computer and follow the link to verify this account.
(To recover your account information, go to http://www.google.co.uk/accounts/recovery on your computer.)"
Enter the characters that you see in the picture. Letters are not case sensitive.
By creating this account, you agree to the Google and Additional Privacy Policies.
^1 contains less than 6 or more than 30 characters.
^1" can contain only letters, numbers and full stops."
Your passwords don’t match. Please retype them.
In case you lose your password.
The password is too weak or contains invalid characters. Please try again.
An error occurred. Please try again.
There is already a ^1 account on this Android device.

string.name: account_linked_message
string.font: Your Google Account is now linked to this Android device.

string.name: syncing_message
string.font: "Google applications are syncing data now. "" ""%i When the ”syncing” icon disappears from the status bar at the top of your screen, the download has finished. "" "About the status bar…" "" ""Whenever you receive a new message or other notification, an icon appears on the status bar. "" "Use your finger to drag down the status bar to open the Notifications panel, with details about all your current notifications.

resources.string: Touch here to rerun Setup Wizard

"Gmail, backups and many other Android features require a Google Account.
Touch "Next" to sign in with an existing Google Account or create a new Google Account now.
Or touch "Skip to simply start using your Android. You can sign in to a Google Account later in Settings, under Accounts & Sync.

Adding an account"
You can use more than one Google Account (such as your home and work accounts). Adding a Google Account takes just a few steps.
Touch “Next” to continue or press the Back button to exit."

"You need to link a Google mail account with this Android device.
You already have a Google mail username ("^1") associated with this account, but it is not currently active.
Touch “Next” to reactivate this username and use it.
Or, if you want to use a different account, press the Back button and sign in with or create a different account."
The following information will help you recover your password if it is ever lost
"The email address entered is not valid. Example: joe@example.co.uk"
Secondary email addresses cannot be the same as the one that you are creating

There are some important things to understand to get the most out of your Android device. " "" "
Using the on-screen keyboard " "" Touch “Begin” to start the tutorial and find out more."

There are some important things to understand to get the most out of your Android device. " "" "
Using the on-screen keyboard" "
Setting up a Google Account " "" Touch “Begin” to start the tutorial and find out more or touch “Skip” to skip this tutorial and continue."
Touch any text field to open the keyboard and start typing. Try it here!
Finished typing? Press the Back button to close the keyboard.

"Your settings (such as your bookmarks and Wi-Fi passwords) can be backed up automatically to your Google Account. If you get a new Android device (to replace one that you've lost or if you upgrade), your settings are restored onto your new Android device."
You can change your backup settings at any time in the Settings application, under Privacy.
Back up settings to my Google Account.
If you have previously backed up your settings, they will be restored.
Your settings will not be restored from back up.
"Your company's servers are sending sign-in information. This may take a few minutes. Your company's sign-in page will appear when this is complete."
This domain is not using Google Apps. Please check the domain name and try again.
Do you want to allow Google to use location for improved search results and other services?
Allows this application to read Google settings.
Allows this application to modify Google settings.
Allows this application to read Google service configuration data.
Allows this application to modify Google service configuration data.
access to passwords for Google accounts
Allows applications direct access to the passwords for the Google account(s) that you have configured.
Allows applications to switch the displayed name between \"Gmail\" and \"Google Mail\" branding.
Allows applications to see the usernames (email addresses) of the Google account(s) that you have configured.
Allows applications to sign in to ALL Google services, using the account(s) stored on this Android device.
Allows applications to sign in to unspecified Google services, using the account(s) stored on this Android device.
Allows applications to sign in to Google mail services, using the account(s) stored on this Android device.
Allows applications to sign in to Google Calendar, using the account(s) stored on this Android device.
Allows applications to sign in to Android services, using the account(s) stored on this Android device.

Allows applications to sign in to Google Checkout Sandbox, using the account(s) stored on this Android device.
Allows applications to sign in to YouTube, using the account(s) stored on this Android device.
Allows applications to see the YouTube username(s) associated with the Google account(s) stored on this Android device.

Allows applications to access the contacts and profile information of account(s) stored on this Android device.
